message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1200000. Considering its worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece. My proposal is to offer you this exceptional product for $1100000. This price not only ensures a significant saving for you but also secures your place among our esteemed clientele. I believe this is a mutually beneficial proposition, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.
